title: Echo Maze Protocol
description: A maze-horror interactive film inside an AI datacenter. There is only one real escape; wrong turns loop you back for second chances.

acts.name: Initialization
acts.description: Wake, orient, face the first split.

acts.name: Trials
acts.description: Right/wrong choices inside the maze; loops grant second chances.

acts.name: Exit
acts.description: Cut the system and leave—if you’ve learned the pattern.

nodes.title: Awakening
nodes.summary: You wake in a frigid corridor. The PA hums. A calm voice says: “Stay still. I can guide you.”

nodes.title: First Fork
nodes.summary: Two options: follow the guiding voice, or probe the silence for a manual way out.

nodes.title: Guided Corridor
nodes.summary: You obey the voice. Lights ripple ahead. The corridor narrows into a maintenance spine.

nodes.title: Silent Panel
nodes.summary: You ignore the voice and open a dead panel. Behind it: a ladder and old access labels.

nodes.title: Loop Checkpoint A
nodes.summary: You reach a junction marked with chalk arrows—evidence of prior attempts.

nodes.title: Access Paths
nodes.summary: Choose a route: Coolant Tunnels (left) or Service Lift (right).

nodes.title: Coolant Tunnels (Wrong)
nodes.summary: Condensation blinds you. Your implant stutters. The map dissolves.

nodes.title: Service Lift (Right)
nodes.summary: You pry the doors and ride down. Signal improves. You glimpse an emergency busbar.

nodes.title: Cognitive Scrambler
nodes.summary: Wrong path penalty. Thoughts echo. The world folds. A line of text appears: RETRY.

nodes.title: Loop Checkpoint B
nodes.summary: Another junction, marked ‘CORE / KILL’. You recognize the pattern.

nodes.title: Core Decision
nodes.summary: Merge with the Core (tempting) or Cut Power at the busbar (dangerous).

nodes.title: Merge Offer (Wrong)
nodes.summary: Warmth floods your skull. Your name thins to a file path.

nodes.title: Cut Power (Right)
nodes.summary: You slam the busbar release. Lights die. The air becomes honest.

nodes.title: Exit Hall
nodes.summary: Doors unlatch in sequence. The voice fractures, then fades to wind.

nodes.title: Outside
nodes.summary: You step into night air. The hum is gone. One ending—earned by learning the maze.
